column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////-Entr√©e. Food is delivered [husband first
column2: again]. My steak was good. Perfect temp
column3: but under-seasoned. The potato had some un-rendered bacon on it. The elote was good
column4: the fries were fries. My husband's steak
column6: had the most gristle we've ever seen in a filet. Between the bone and the steak was a huge mess
column7: and the steak was all lobe-y and just inedible. The bone side always cooks more than the rest- we know that- but it was a hard medium on a rare steak. He's upset [it's an $80 steak
